setBody.constant: <breakfast_menu> <food> <id>1</id> <name>Belgian Waffles</name> <price>$5.95</price> <description> Two of our famous Belgian Waffles with plenty of real maple syrup </description> <calories>650</calories> </food> <food> <id>2</id> <name>Strawberry Belgian Waffles</name> <price>$7.95</price> <description> Light Belgian waffles covered with strawberries and whipped cream </description> <calories>900</calories> </food> <food> <id>3</id> <name>Berry-Berry Belgian Waffles</name> <price>$8.95</price> <description> Belgian waffles covered with assorted fresh berries and whipped cream </description> <calories>900</calories> </food> <food> <id>4</id> <name>French Toast</name> <price>$4.50</price> <description> Thick slices made from our homemade sourdough bread </description> <calories>600</calories> </food> <food> <id>5</id> <name>Homestyle Breakfast</name> <price>$6.95</price> <description> Two eggs, bacon or sausage, toast, and our ever-popular hash browns </description> <calories>950</calories> </food> <food> <id>6</id> <name>Homestyle Breakfast</name> <price>$6.95</price> <description> Two eggs, bacon or sausage, toast, and our ever-popular hash browns </description> <calories>950</calories> </food> </breakfast_menu>
